item.title: Artificial intelligence-assisted electrochemical sensors for qualitative and semi-quantitative multiplexed analyses
item.description:
Rocco Cancelliere, Mario Molinara, Antonio Licheri, Antonio Maffucci, Laura Micheli, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2025. https://openalex.org/W4406624736
AI-integrated electrochemical sensors boost peak resolution and sensitivity, enabling precise detection of electroactive species in complex matrices. This method enhances analytical capabilities, providing an analytically robust solution.
item.author: Rocco Cancelliere, Mario Molinara, Antonio Licheri, Antonio Maffucci, Laura Micheli

item.title: Commit: Mini article for dynamic reporting of incremental improvements to previous scholarly work
item.description:
Alán Aspuru–Guzik, Jason E. Hein, Joshua Schrier, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2025. https://openalex.org/W4406633347
Introducing Commit, a new article type at Digital Discovery intended for reporting incremental improvements on work previously published in the journal.
item.author: Alán Aspuru–Guzik, Jason E. Hein, Joshua Schrier

item.title: Exploring the expertise of large language models in materials science and metallurgical engineering
item.description:
Christophe Bajan, G. Lambard, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2025. https://openalex.org/W4406736930
This study establishes a performance baseline for 15 LLMs on materials science tasks using the MaScQA benchmark, paving the way for AI-driven advancements in materials discovery and analysis.
item.author: Christophe Bajan, G. Lambard

item.title: Cartesian Encoding Graph Neural Network for Crystal Structures Property Prediction: Application to Thermal Ellipsoid Estimation
item.description:
Andrés Solé, Albert Mosella-Montoro, Joan Cardona, Silvia Gómez‐Coca, Daniel Aravena, Eliseo Ruíz, Javier Ruiz‐Hidalgo, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4406780971
In the diffraction resolution of crystal structures, the thermal ellipsoids are a critical parameter that is usually more difficult to determine than atomic positions. These ellipsoids are quantified through the...
item.author: Andrés Solé, Albert Mosella-Montoro, Joan Cardona, Silvia Gómez‐Coca, Daniel Aravena, Eliseo Ruíz, Javier Ruiz‐Hidalgo
